*Please clear your cache if you are looking for updates*
You can clear your cache by pressing Ctrl + Shift + Del or you can follow this link
Disclaimer 
The purpose of the Alaska WRR is solely to provide a source of information that you may wish to consider to inform your planning process. It is not intended to solicit group advice or facilitate consensus among stakeholders. However, please be aware that use of this information does not guarantee approval of any permit or mitigation proffered, nor does its use guarantee funding support from any agency involved with the Alaska WRR’s development. Nothing within the Alaska WRR constitutes a policy position or proposed or final agency action from any agency involved with the Alaska WRR’s development. Because of the preliminary nature of the data in the Alaska WRR, this information should be used only for preliminary planning purposes.

Also, please be aware that the Alaska WRR technical development team and contributors do not guarantee the accuracy or reliability of the information contained herein. The map data may be inaccurate or contain errors or omissions. Furthermore, the AK WRR map data is externally sourced and may be subject to additional terms and conditions from the original data sources. If you use the Alaska WRR, you will be responsible for consulting with the original data sources to ensure appropriate use and interpretation of the data. You will also be fully responsible for any risks or damages from using this tool.
